version_description:
- Redesigned Markets section: favorite tickers of your choice and access pre/after market price
- Picture-in-picture (PIP): watch Live TV and videos while also reading articles
- Background Audio: continue listening to radio, podcasts, and clips whi

- Redesigned Markets section: favorite tickers of your choice and access pre/after market price
- Picture-in-picture (PIP): watch Live TV and videos while also reading articles
- Background Audio: continue listening to radio, podcasts, and clips whi

- Markets section: improved color indicators and navigation responsiveness
- New redesigned quote pages with industry and sector comparisons

- Markets section: improved color indicators and navigation responsiveness
- New redesigned quote pages with industry and sector comparisons
- Performance improvements

-Listen to your favorite shows tuning into Bloomberg's live radio network on the go with the new live radio card in the home feed.
-We hear you! Text size adjustment for articles is now available. Increase or decrease the font size for easier reading.<

◉ Performance improvements.

◉ New iOS 12 feature - Now you can use Siri to quickly access your favorite parts of the app! Check Settings to set up your own voice shortcuts.

◉ Full coverage of the 2018 U.S. midterm elections, including an interactive map showing real-time results.
◉ Live coverage of the New Economy Forum in Singapore Nov. 6-7.
◉ New video and audio player with improved controls and related content.

◉ Manage newsletter preferences

◉ Chromecast integration: stream your favorite shows and tv to your Chromecast device or Google Home!
